title: Teen fatally shoots himself in the head by accident in NW Houston
content:
HOUSTON- A young man died after accidentally shooting himself in the head in northwest Houston on Friday night.
According to police, the incident occurred around 10:30 p.m. at an apartment complex at Long Point Road and Oak Tree Drive.
Police said the victim was playing with a gun inside the apartment with several other friends. The gun went off and the victim accidental shot himself in the head.
He died inside the apartment.
(© 2017 KHOU)
